content: @Sandra Vance So when I go to add a Schedule in Whova for the NHSN ADE Track (https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=130484306) the track doesn't show up in the list of tracks - is there a reason why not?
Actually - it looks like that list on the Schedule page is the list from the last Connectathon?

Sarah Gaunt said:

Sandra Vance So when I go to add a Schedule in Whova for the NHSN ADE Track (https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=130484306) the track doesn't show up in the list of tracks - is there a reason why not?

Looks like it needs added as do a few of the newer tracks. I will have Josh do this first thing in the morning and rest assured you will still get your smiley face sticker for entering your schedule on time. :-)
For sure it's the smiley face sticker that's important! :joy:
